class weight.base.BaseWeight(**params)¶

get_string() → str¶
abstract get_weight() → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

获取权重 :returns: :rtype: 权重DataFrame

set_signal(signal_df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) → None¶

设置信号DataFrame

参数

signal_df (DataFrame) – 信号DataFrame, index为交易时间, columns为品种代码, data为信号, 做多为1, 做空为-1,空仓为0

返回

返回类型

None

Module contents¶

EqualWeight: 等权重 GroupEqualWeight: 分组等权重 NoRiskNeutralEqualWeight: 不dollar neutral的等权重 RiskNeutralEqualWeight: 不dollar neutral的等权重
